Select a Hero to Edit None {{hero.name}}
import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../app/Models/hero' import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; import * as fromHeroList from '../app/heroes/Store/heroes.reducer' @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { constructor( private store: Store ) {console.log("app comp init")} //heroes: Observable; title='Data-Store'; heroes: Hero[] = []; updateChosen: boolean = true; selectedHero: string = ""; ngOnInit(): void { this.store.select('heroList').subscribe( { next: (Heroes) => this.heroes = Heroes.Heroes, error: (err) => console.log(err) } ) } alertm() { console.log("alert") } update(hero: Hero){ if (hero === null) { this.updateChosen = true; } else { this.updateChosen = false } console.log(this.updateChosen) } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed app component") } }
